    Nmap

    Como usar Nmap.

    1. Escaneo ICMP sin resolución de nombres

    -sP → Ecaneno ICMP.
    -n → Sin resolución de nombres.
    meizoso.github.io
    >$ nmap -sP -n 192.168.1.0/24
    Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-03-15 16:39 CET
    Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.1
    Host is up (0.0026s latency).
    Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.11
    Host is up (0.0064s latency).
    Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.30
    Host is up (0.021s latency).
    Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.62
    Host is up (0.0042s latency).
    Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.70
    Host is up (0.068s latency).
    Nmap done: 256 IP addresses (5 hosts up) scanned in 3.52 seconds


    2. Escaneo de todos los puertos y la versión de todos los servicios

    -p- → Ecanenar todos los puertos.
    -sV → Vaersión de los servicios.
    Warning: Este tipo de escaneo es muy ruidoso y lento por lo que no se recomienda hacerlo.
    meizoso.github.io
    >$ nmap -p- -sV 192.168.1.30
    Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-03-15 16:39 CET
    Nmap scan report for DESKTOP-1NG1D24.home (192.168.1.30)
    Host is up (0.095s latency).
    All 65535 scanned ports on DESKTOP-1NG1D24.home (192.168.1.30) are in ignored states.
    Not shown: 65535 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)
    Service detection performed. Please report any incorrect results at https://nmap.org/submit/ .
    Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 32.36 seconds


    2. Escaneo de toda la red

    Para escanear toda la red debemos cambiar el número de host por *.
    meizoso.github.io
    >$ nmap 192.168.1.*
    Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-03-17 08:44 CET
    Nmap scan report for liveboxfibra (192.168.1.1)
    Host is up (0.028s latency).
    Not shown: 993 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)
    PORT STATE SERVICE
    53/tcp open domain
    80/tcp open http
    139/tcp open netbios-ssn
    443/tcp open https
    445/tcp open microsoft-ds
    6969/tcp open acmsoda
    8080/tcp filtered http-proxy

    Nmap scan report for linux.home (192.168.1.30)
    Host is up (0.033s latency).
    All 1000 scanned ports on linux.home (192.168.1.30) are in ignored states.
    Not shown: 1000 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)

    Nmap scan report for Archer_C1200.home (192.168.1.62)
    Host is up (0.00082s latency).
    Not shown: 996 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)
    PORT STATE SERVICE
    22/tcp open ssh
    80/tcp open http
    1900/tcp open upnp
    20005/tcp open btx

    Nmap done: 256 IP addresses (3 hosts up) scanned in 40.61 seconds


    3. Excluir una IP del escaneo

    nmap 192.168.1.* –exclude 192.168.1.30
    meizoso.github.io
    >$ nmap 192.168.1.* --exclude 192.168.1.30
    Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-03-17 09:02 CET
    Nmap scan report for liveboxfibra (192.168.1.1)
    Host is up (0.031s latency).
    Not shown: 993 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)
    PORT STATE SERVICE
    53/tcp open domain
    80/tcp open http
    139/tcp open netbios-ssn
    443/tcp open https
    445/tcp open microsoft-ds
    6969/tcp open acmsoda
    8080/tcp filtered http-proxy

    Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.11
    Host is up (0.036s latency).
    All 1000 scanned ports on 192.168.1.11 are in ignored states.
    Not shown: 1000 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)

    Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.62
    Host is up (0.00093s latency).
    Not shown: 996 closed tcp ports (conn-refused)
    PORT STATE SERVICE
    22/tcp open ssh
    80/tcp open http
    1900/tcp open upnp
    20005/tcp open btx

    Nmap done: 255 IP addresses (3 hosts up) scanned in 41.44 seconds


    4. Escaneo TCP SYN

    Este comando comprueba si el puerto objetivo está escuchando. Mediante este comando se puede llevar a cabo una técnica conocida como escaneo half-opening, esta comienza como una conexión normal pero no llega a establecerse un handshake por ambas partes, sino que enviamos un único paquete SYN y esperamos la respuesta.

    nmap -sS [IP]
    meizoso.github.io
    >$ nmap -sS 127.0.0.1
    Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-03-25 00:04 CET
    Nmap scan report for localhost (127.0.0.1)
    Host is up (0.024s latency).
    Not shown: 998 closed tcp ports (reset)
    PORT STATE SERVICE
    4000/tcp open remoteanything
    8888/tcp open sun-answerbook

    Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 1.16 seconds


    Resumen de los escaneos de NMAP

    Comando Explicación
    nmap -sP -n [IP]/24 Escaneo ICMP sin resolución de nombres
    nmap -p- -sV [IP] Escaneo de todos los puertos y la versión de todos los servicios
    nmap 192.168.0.* Escaneo de toda la red
    nmap -sS [IP] Escaneo TCP SYN (half-opening)
